amendment.description: An amendment numbered 13 printed in House Report 111-503 to state that no funds authorized under the act may be used to pay the salary of an employee who has been officially disciplined for viewing, downloading, or exchanging pornography (including child pornography) on a Federal Government computer or while performing official Federal Government duties.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Maffei amendment (A013) Agreed to by recorded vote: 416 - 0, 1 Present (Roll no. 352).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Maffei amendment (A013) Agreed to by recorded vote: 416 - 0, 1 Present (Roll no. 352).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A013) offered by Mr. Maffei.
